title: Cabbage Pachadi | Chutney 😋
content:
Side dish: Cabbage Chutney  Servings: 4 Duration: 30 minutes Chutney is basically a thick sauce or dip relish as a side for fried fritters/ vada / any South Indian Breakfast. I prepared Something uncommon and delicious chutney with cabbage. It’s simple to make and very soothing side goes well with idly/dosa/rice or roti. Just stir fry ingredients , ground it and toss with tempering. You can essence the aroma of freshly toasted cabbage chutney. Let’s start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Cabbage - 1/2 kg - finely chopped
  • Red tomatoes 🍅 - 2 - big sized
  • Green chillies - 4
  • Tamarind pulp - 1 tsp
  • Salt - 1/2 tsp
  • Coconut oil - 1 Tb sp
  • Cumin seeds - 1/2 Tb sp
  • Garlic cloves - 3 - chopped
For tempering:
  • Coconut oil - 2 teaspoon
  • Mustard seeds - 1/4 tsp
  • Cumin seeds - 1/2 tsp
  • Urad dal - 1/2 Tb sp
  • Chana dal - 1/2 Tb sp
  • Curry leaves - 5
Procedure:
  • Add cumin seeds, green chillies and garlic cloves in a medium heated pan
  • Saute a minute then add chopped tomatoes and tamarind
  • Saute and add chopped cabbage
  • Saute more 5 minutes or till cooked 80%
  • Turn off heat and transfer it to mixer grinder
  • Add salt and blend coarsely then transfer it to the same pan with tempering
  • Saute more 5 minutes or till moisture evaporates
  • Take out to a serving bowl and enjoy this Chutney with rice 🍚, roti, idly, Dosa or any breakfast you wish to have but I loved it to have with Daddojanam / Curd/ yogurt Rice
  • Happy Cooking and Enjoy your day 🙂
